prefix_prompt: I want to write music captions that describe the temporal order of two instruments. Write this caption in three styles
sufix_prompt: The answers need to be three sentences parsed with newlines. Do not number them. Do not add subjective information. Do not add any additional information than the temporal order.
captions:
Style 1:
Strings are heard first, followed by the sound of the guitar.
Guitar follows the strings in the musical sequence.
The guitar comes after the strings.

Style 2:
The strings come before the guitar in the musical arrangement.
The guitar is the second instrument to be heard.
Strings are the first instrument in the musical order.

Style 3:
The strings are the initial sound in the musical sequence.
